sn35.32:1.3: Katama ca sa, bhikkhave, sabbamannitasamugghatasappaya patipada?
sn35.32:4.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.32:6.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.32:10.1: “Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.32:12.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.32:14.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.32:18.4: yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.32:22.1: “Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.32:24.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.32:26.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.32:28.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati.
sn35.32:28.2: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.32:28.3: jivhayapi nibbindati, rasesupi …pe… yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati …pe….
sn35.32:28.4: Manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovinnanepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati.
sn35.32:28.5: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.32:28.6: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.32:28.7: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn35.32:28.8: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, sabbamannitasamugghatasappaya patipada”ti.
